name: Levitation Attack
Lore: 'Vader used his mastery of the Force to levitate objects from around the room. This calculated attack was designed to break Luke''s spirit as well as his body.',
Text: 'If a battle was just initiated where you have a character of ability > 3 present, search your Used Pile for one device which deploys on a character. Add device''s destiny number to your total power, then place device on top of Used Pile.',
